channel.title: CVE Feed for AlCoda -- NetBiblio WebOPAC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AlCoda -- NetBiblio WebOPAC

item.title: CVE-2021-42551|2024-08-04T03:38:49.264Z -- alcoda -- netbiblio%20webopac
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the search functionality of AlCoda NetBiblio WebOPAC allows an unauthenticated user to craft a reflected Cross-Site Scripting attack. This issue affects: AlCoda NetBiblio WebOPAC versions prior to 4.0.0.320; versions later than 4.0.0.328. This issue does not affect: AlCoda NetBiblio WebOPAC version 4.0.0.335 and later versions.
